recipe.title: Curried Herring
ingredients: 2 (8-oz) jars herring "party snacks" in white wine sauce, rinsed, drained, and patted dry
instructions: Remove and discard skin and dark flesh from herring. Cut herring into 1/4-inch pieces. Whisk together remaining ingredients and stir in herring. Season with salt and pepper.
